testcase.name: SoftAssert

failure.message:
2 expectations failed. JSON path limit doesn't match. Expected: <22> Actual: 20
JSON path results[0].description doesn't match. Expected: map containing ["da-DKzzzz"->ANYTHING] Actual: {da-DK=Category description, en-GB=Speakers description, de-DE=Category description, sv-SE=Category description}
